channel.title: Uunitty
channel.description: This is the RSS feed of Uunitty's website

item.title: I like it here. I think I'll stay.
item.description: After being offline for about a month or so and after deleting my old online identities and creating an entirely new one, I can say I like it on X. I like posting on this blog; I like this. I’m not entirely brainrotted like I was before, and I’m not...

item.title: The Joy of fixing my computers
item.description: Fix that PC! Every time I have to open up a PC to fix it, it feels like an internal 500 error. I’m convinced I’m going to break something, that it won’t boot again, and that I’ll end up paying hundreds of euros to repair it. But every time, it...

item.title: First blog post
item.description: The beginning is here - Nothing to see here yet, there is more to come tho!

item.title: New ways of connecting
item.description: The future is now old man! I’ve had multiple accounts in just 10 years. Scattered all across the internet: Mastodon, X, Facebook, Google, YouTube, Instagram, Snapchat, etc. With multiple names, nicknames, my own IRL name, and profile pictures. Some of the time I followed content creators, other times politics, etc....
